name: Spacewards
description:
Rescue a fellow astronaut stranded on a forsaken spacecraft.

Spacewards is a gripping platforming adventure in a creepy and hazardous environment.


In Spacewards you can walk, jump and use your jetpack boost to help you overcome obstacles. If you die, you can restart the room you're currently in. But use your jetpack boosts wisely, or you may get stranded, which will force you to give up and start afresh.

WASD: Jump/Walk

SPACE: Jetpack

P: Pause Menu

Keys are redefinable in the main menu settings.

IMPORTANT NOTE: There may be situations where the player is going to need to start a new run in order to do the rooms with the proper setup! We encourage you to get familiar with the puzzles/rooms and have fun! Thanks for playing! 

Design iDLELUKE and Hoimar
Code Hoimar
Graphics iDLELUKE
Sound & Music Apartao

Special Thanks to Rainedoe, Zaraza, Saint11
